name: artscorestudio/jquery-asfAnimation
description: jQuery Plugin for display an introduction animation on Artscore Studio Website

sugggest.robloach/component-installer: Allows installation of Components via Composer.
sugggest.components/normalize.css: Normalize.css is a customisable CSS file that makes browsers render all elements more consistently and in line with modern standards. We researched the differences between default browser styles in order to precisely target only the styles that need normalizing.
